messages: 0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:14): there is no agenda at least
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:14): is there something we should talk about
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:15): it is possible that I or masayuki will propose a change to wheel events
227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6 (19:15): 5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e, 0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c, we can have a call if you like
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:15): delta values should probably be doubles
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:16): I need to discuss with masayuki first
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:16): sorry, thought you meant is it ok to have a conference :-)
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:17): the real last call! :-) .... and any node list updates?
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:19): I didn't meet jresig when I was in US...
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:19): so far only sicking's proposal can handle perhaps the most needed mutation event, DOMCharacterDataModified
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:20): it is possible that we'll implement it right after FF4, with moz prefix
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:20): so that people can try it out
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:22): yes, that's a limitation of resig's current proposal
227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6 (19:22): are we going t have a call?
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (19:23): ok, 22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592; I see IA_WebApps(DOM3)2:00PM scheduled to start in 40 minutes
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (19:23): Meeting: Web Applications Working Group Teleconference
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (19:23): ok, 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6; conference Team_(webapps)18:20Z scheduled with code 26631 (CONF1) for 60 minutes until 1920Z
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:23): 5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e: FYI, the reason for the possible change in wheel events is because Win7 supports "high resolution" scrolling
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (19:24): and what Windows gives to UA, doesn't exactly map to pixels
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (19:24): ok, 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6; the call is being made
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:39): 0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c:  the wheel delta should be double or float
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:40): travis: float would be better, doubles are a bit big
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:43): RESOLUTION: change deltaX, deltaY, deltaZ to float for WheelEvent
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:44): 0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c:  for mutation events replacement, jresig's proposal doesn't handle the most important event DOMCharacterDataModified
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:44): 0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c:  for mutation events replacement, jresig's proposal doesn't handle the most important event DOMCharacterDataModified
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:45): jross: agreed, it's a shortfall of his proposal....but I think his proposal could be improved to support it
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:48): 5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e: doesn't have resig's proposal on there
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:55): 0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c:  we should all read these proposals and talk about this next week
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:56): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: this is not really dom 3 events, so we should move forward with a replacement but perhaps in a different conf
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:56): 5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e: i'll send out mail to get the conversation started
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (19:59): ISSUE-121 -- Consider generalizing the 'textInput' event to cover all user-initiated changes -- open
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (19:59): 5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e: i'll mail out the updates we should make to the issues
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (20:01): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: does anyone want to add mousewheel again?
5059ecaa4fb3ab1183f267bf1613010e (20:01): RESOLUTION:  we will not add mousewheel back
